markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Targeting System](/Feats.aspx?ID=2467) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 72 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your ocular processors are augmented with advanced targeting systems, which allow you to more easily pinpoint your enemy and read their movements. You can cast [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) once per day as a 1st-level arcane innate spell.
name: Advanced Targeting System
